TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegularExpressionValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator

summary.span: 验证相关输入控件的值是否与正则表达式指定的模式匹配。

span.span: Validates whether the value of an associated input control matches the pattern specified by a regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件检查输入控件的值是否与由正则表达式定义的模式匹配。The control checks whether the value of an input control matches a pattern defined by a regular expression. 此验证类型允许你查看的字符，如电子邮件地址、 电话号码和邮政编码的可预测序列。This type of validation allows you to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in email addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes. > [!NOTE] > 验证成功的输入的控件是否为空。Validation succeeds if the input control is empty. 如果关联的输入控件需要一个值，则使用除了控制控件。If a value is required for the associated input control, use a control in addition to the control. 除非浏览器不支持客户端验证或显式禁用客户端验证执行服务器端和客户端验证 (通过设置属性`false`)。Both server-side and client-side validation are performed unless the browser does not support client-side validation or client-side validation is explicitly disabled (by setting the property to `false`). 正则表达式验证实现是比在服务器上的客户端上略有不同。The regular-expression validation implementation is slightly different on the client than on the server. 在客户端，使用了 JScript 正则表达式语法。On the client, JScript regular-expression syntax is used. 在服务器上，使用语法。On the server, syntax is used. 由于 JScript 正则表达式语法已的子集语法中，建议 JScript 正则表达式语法用于为了生成客户端和服务器上相同的结果。Since JScript regular expression syntax is a subset of syntax, it is recommended that JScript regular-expression syntax be used in order to yield the same results on both the client and the server. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件内部控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 有关验证控件的其他信息，请参阅。For additional information about validation controls, see . 正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要验证的 5 位邮政编码控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the control to validate a five-digit postal code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 向指定的 对象添加控件需要呈现的 HTML 特性和样式。

span.span: Adds to the specified object the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便错误消息始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always displays as bold. [!code-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用使用`CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender`定义在前面的示例中，Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the use the `CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender` control, defined in the preceding example, on a Web Forms page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Function EvaluateIsValid () As Boolean

summary.span: 指示输入控件中的值是否有效。

span.span: Indicates whether the value in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果输入控件中的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终检查根据中的匹配项的表达式的值。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always checks the value against the expression for a match in a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid`定义在前面的示例中，Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid` control, defined in the preceding example, on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomRegularExpressionValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_regularexpressionvalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)]

public: property Nullable<int> MatchTimeout { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在操作超时前执行单个匹配操作的最大时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or set the maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.

value.span: 用于在操作超时前执行单个匹配操作的最大时间间隔。

span.span: The maximum time interval to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置确定字段验证模式的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression that determines the pattern used to validate a field.

value.span: 指定用于验证字段格式的正则表达式的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies the regular expression used to validate a field for format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定用于检查的字符，如社会安全号码、 电子邮件地址、 电话号码和邮政编码的可预测序列的模式。Use this property to specify the pattern used to check for predictable sequences of characters, such as those in social security numbers, email addresses, telephone numbers, and postal codes. 不对空字符串执行验证。The does not perform validation on an empty string. 如果要测试的字符串可能为空，则使用以及。If the string you are testing might be empty, use the as well as the . 正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information on regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你遇到与模式匹配构造问题，请尝试包装与表达式"^ （"和"） $"。If you experience problems with pattern matching constructs, try wrapping the expression with "^(" and ")$". 例如，"|ab"变为"^ (|ab) $"。For example, "a|ab" becomes "^(a|ab)$". 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可以验证具有五个数字的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to validate a field with five numeric digits. 当单击控件时，生成事件处理程序检查属性以确定是否中的文本满足正则表达式。When the control is clicked, the resulting event handler checks the property of the to determine whether the text in the satisfies the regular expression. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RegularExpressionValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 正则表达式的格式不对。

span.span: The regular expression is not properly formed.
